project.title: Wally's Bar - New Babbage
project.description:
Wally's Bar was introduced in Star Citizen's Alpha 3.9 update as part of the New Babbage interior release. 
Check out the break down here: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/kDo1yn

I worked on the center bar area designing many aspects and modeling everything with exception of the foliage and prop assets. I also worked on the prototype for the lighting set up for this space before the lighting department came in. The lighting feature walls that sport an Aurora like effect were also designed and implemented by myself and were really fun. 

Credit:
Art Direction by Ian Leyland
Art Lead: Nicholas Etheridge
Senior Environment artists: Josh Van Zuylen, Adam Sanders
Junior Environment artists: Fredrik Maribo, Alec Cornet, Tom Radford
Lighting Lead: Chris Campbell
Senior Lighting artist: Arther Yang
Concept art: Chris Doretz, Sheng Lam
 
© 2020 Cloud Imperium Rights LLC and Cloud Imperium Rights Ltd.

project.title: Into the Wolf's Den- Castle Hall
project.description:
Into the Wolf's Den is a milestone project I did for school (Artside Game Art School), I imagined it as an adventure game which  involves boss fights (just as shadow of the colossus) and stealth phases.
You will control Umbrielle, a young woman who decided to flee from everyday's life frustrations by taking refuge in a world she created entirely. However as time goes by, the boundaries between this world and the real one are becoming tenuous
The game would be heavily based on the relationship she has with Tremor, a wolf who follows her everywhere and acts not only as a driving force but also as a brake for her.
I had a lot of fun working on this project, thanks to the Artside crew for their great guidance!

project.title: Cinnamon Rolls Material - 100% Procedural
project.description:
Hi guys, I'm back with a new food related material (Cinnamon Rolls material) I learned a lot of stuff while working on this material, to be honest it's the first time I create a food material. I tried to make different variations of this material, like a real pastry, with pistachios, with honey, with glaze, caramelized, burned. I could also do more but I wanted to keep it simple and tasty. I'm sorry if I make you feel hungry :D 
C&C are welcome guys!

project.title: Tales of Runeterra: Don't Mess With Yordles | League of Legends: Wild Rift
project.description: I had the pleasure to work on some characters for the latest League of Legends: Wild Rift trailer @Axis Studios as a commission for Riot Games. I was responsible for modeling Teemo, Lulu, some Env elements and additional blendshape creations. This is a huge team effort, hats of to the amazing guys at Axis and Riot. Check out the episode on youtube!

project.title: Shan Hai Scrolls Neeko Splash
project.description: Splash art for another one of my favorite champions, Neeko! The in game model and vfx are super pretty, and I love her concept, can't wait to play it. Thanks to the team for their feedback and support!

project.title: Aldecaldos + Badlands community
project.description:
One of the coolest tasks in an open-world game:  crowd designs. All gangs were split among different concept artists, together with Łukasz Poduch we were responsible for all nomads and badlands inhabitants, including the Aldecaldos and the Wraiths. Later we worked on the visual identity for them like logotypes, graffiti paintings and stickers. Also, we had to prepare detailed versions of new assets like clothes, gear, masks, etc. Here's a bunch of my concepts, hope you like them!

Art direction: Paweł Mielniczuk
Vehicles designs: Lukasz Poduch

project.title: Downtown West Modular Pack - UE4
project.description:
Downtown West Modular Pack is a UE4 project created by PurePolygons with the collaboration of 6 artists in total. The pack will be available for free indefinitely on the Unreal Marketplace and can be downloaded and used by anyone within the Unreal Engine. 
(Link Coming Soon)

Downtown West realizes the look of a classic mid-western style outdoor shopping street in the United States. With colorful store fronts, rich foliage, and inviting surroundings.

Myself: Art Direction, Concept, World Building, Asset Creation, Texture Creation, UE4 Materials /Blueprints, Lighting, Trees / Grass, all of the Modular Ground Work, and various other works to bring the project together
The Team:
Anthony Brun - https://www.artstation.com/abrun4
Balazs Domjan - https://www.artstation.com/blazs91
Fred Hooper - https://www.artstation.com/freddyhoops
Inka Sipola - https://www.artstation.com/dinkart
Javier Perez - https://www.artstation.com/meshmodeler
